# ion-card-content

`ion-card-content` is a child component of `ion-card` that adds some content padding.
It is recommended that any text content for a card should be placed in an `ion-card-content`.

You can view a live example of this in Angular [here](https://stackblitz.com/edit/ionic-angular-card-content) and in React [here](https://stackblitz.com/edit/ionic-react-card-content).


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                       | Type            | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------- | --------------- | ----------- |
| `mode`   | `mode`    | The mode determines which platform styles to use. | `"ios" \| "md"` | `undefined` |
